attributes.action: Recognition of the Support Given by Service Families
attributes.additional_details:
We write to request that, in light of recent events, that a full investigation be instigate into the way in which the Senior Management Team at RAF Stations around the UK are conducting business with the personnel that are based there.

It would seem that OC PMS and their relevant Station Commanders are seeing fit to interfere in the private lives of their subordinates to the extent that a number of relationships have ended in divorce, or dissolution, due to the Personnel Management Squadron only communicating with “dependants” through their uniformed partners.
